title: New: Oberhofer – Gotta Go
body:
And so to another year, complete with the same retrodden stock phrases about the industry having shut down for a while, the weather being grim, and the best tunes around being those which take us away from the damp and cloud and back-to-work malaise.

January scribblings about music would be utterly lost without them.

Thank goodness for the kind people at [Cooperative Music](http://cooperativemusic.com/ "They're nice. "), then, who have supplied us with this, the latest pop powerhouse from 20 year old Tacoma, WA native **Brad Oberhofer**. It’s called _Gotta Go_, it’s out via [Black Iris](http://whiteiris.tv/oberhofer "nah, I'd never heard of 'em either. ") on January 12th, and its bittersweet, skyscraper-sized hooks will have you singing from your seat on the train or at your desk or running for shelter from one of the freak gales that are enjoying a bit of a vogue at the moment. Expect a full-length from Brad and his band sometime this year.

 [Oberhofer – Gotta Go](http://soundcloud.com/cooperativemusic/oberhofer-gotta-go) by [Cooperative Music](http://soundcloud.com/cooperativemusic)
